  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3420d662-53ad-4a89-a258-7ed42868c3af#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az Aranybulla pecsétje</string>
            <string language="en">Seal of the Golden Bull</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dichtung des goldenen Bull</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Joint de Bull d'or</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Selo da Bull dourada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guarnizione del Bull dorato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφραγίδα του χρυσού Δελτίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sello de la Bull de oro</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Aranybulla pecsétjének bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of seal of the Golden Bull</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Aranybulla,  oklevél,  pecsét,  II. András,  nemesi szabadságjogok,  </string>
            <string language="en">Golden Bull, charter, seal, Andrew the Second, nobiliary human rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Dichtung des goldenen Bull</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation du joint de Bull d'or</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do selo da Bull dourada</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione della guarnizione del Bull dorato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση της σφραγίδας του χρυσού Δελτίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del sello de la Bull de oro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Goldenes Bull, Charter, Dichtung, Andrew das zweite, 
nobiliary menschliche Rechte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bull d'or, charte, joint, Andrew le deuxième, droits de
l'homme nobiliary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bull dourada, carta patente, selo, Andrew as segundas, 
direitas humanas nobiliary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bull dorato, lettera, guarnizione, Andrew il secondo, 
diritti dell'uomo nobiliary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χρυσό Bull, χάρτης, σφραγίδα, Andrew τα δεύτερα, 
αριστοκρατικά ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bull de oro, carta, sello, Andrew la segunda, derechos 
humanos nobiliary</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>

        <metaMetadata>

    </metadata>
